# Decorator pattern example in TypeScript

This is a simple decorator pattern example done in **TypeScript**.\
If you want to learn about Design patterns I highly recommend checking [Refactoring Guru](https://refactoring.guru/design-patterns).\
To run the code example in this repo simply run `ts-node decorator.ts` at the root of your cloned repo.
